thread.title: BRIEF-Daqo New Energy Announces Pricing Of Registered Follow On Offering Of American Depositary Shares

title: BRIEF-Daqo New Energy Announces Pricing Of Registered Follow On Offering Of American Depositary Shares

organizations.name: offering of american depositary shares reuters

text:
April 12, 2018 / 1:49 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Daqo New Energy Announces Pricing Of Registered Follow On Offering Of American Depositary Shares Reuters Staff 
April 12 (Reuters) - Daqo New Energy Corp: 
* DAQO NEW ENERGY CORP. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF REGISTERED FOLLOW-ON OFFERING OF AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES 
* PRICED ITS REGISTERED FOLLOW-ON OFFERING OF AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES AT US$55.0 PER ADS 
* COMPANY WILL ISSUE AND SELL 2 MLN ADSS IN OFFERING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
